thread.title: Teaser of NTR's next creates a record
thread.title_full: Teaser of NTR's next creates a record - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Teaser of NTR's next creates a record
text: This is sensational. With just a 30 second teaser, Young Tiger NTR is creating a huge storm on social media. Released on the eve of Vijaya Dasami, the teaser of NTR's upcoming film Nannaku Prematho has already amassed more than 1 million views in just 36 hours, a fastest ever feat for a Telugu film. With more than 26,000 likes, the film's teaser has also become the 'most liked teaser' ever in Telugu films. This phenomenon once again proves NTR's mass adulation and how eager his fans are to watch the film. This Sukumar directorial will soon fly to Spain for its next schedule and the makers are planning to release the film during the Pongal season.
